description: This source file defines a React functional component named TaskList. It renders a scrollable list of tasks, including handling the case when no tasks are present. The component receives task data and callback functions as props to manage task interactions.

methods.name: TaskList({ tasks, onToggleComplete, onDelete, onUpdate })
methods.description: A React functional component that displays a list of tasks with headers, count, and task items. Supports accessibility features and conditional rendering for empty list.

ctags.name: TaskList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TaskList({ tasks, onToggleComplete, onDelete, onUpdate }) {$/
